responses.qx_text: Which of the following best describes your ability to walk?
answer_options: I can walk without any problem
I have some difficulties with walking, but can walk without aid
I require a cane, crutch, or other aid to walk
I require a wheelchair for almost all activities
I am confined to bed most of the time
answer_text: I require a cane, crutch, or other aid to walk

responses.qx_text: How far can you walk without needing to use an aid (cane, crutch, walker)?
answer_options: More than 1500 feet, 500 meters or about five football fields
About 900 to 1500 feet, 300 meters or about 3 football fields
About 600 to 899 feet, 200 meters or about 2 football fields
About 300 to 599 feet, 100 meters or about 1 football field

responses.qx_text: When I use an aid (cane, crutch, walker), I can walk:
answer_options: About 300 to 400 feet, 120 meters or about 1 football field
answer_text: About 300 to 400 feet, 120 meters or about 1 football field

responses.qx_text: How easy it is for you to start urinating?
answer_options: I do NOT have trouble with starting to urinate
I sometimes have trouble starting to urinate
I often have trouble starting to urinate, and/or experience frequent urinary tract infections
My difficulty urinating is so severe that I require intermittent catheterization
My difficulty urinating is so severe that I require an indwelling catheter

answer_text: I do NOT have trouble with starting to urinate

answer_options: I have no problems with concentration or memory
I have some concentration and memory problems, or problems with coping with stress, but I am able to handle my daily routines including completing this survey
I have problems with concentration and memory that my friends and family notice; this is beginning to affect my daily routine. It makes completing  this survey difficult
I have severe impairment in my cognitive (thinking) abilities; for example, I sometimes forget where I am and who I am talking to. I need help completing this survey
I have no meaningful conversation and am unable to handle my affairs because of my severe cognitive problems; I need someone else to complete this survey
answer_text: I have no problems with concentration or memory
responses.qx_global_text: On an average day, which of the following best describes your cognitive (thinking) ability?

answer_options: I experience mild fatigue. I do feel the need to rest more often, but I can still complete all my daily tasks
Due to my fatigue I have to rest unusually often; this affects less than half of my daily activities. I often cannot complete my daily routine without naps or significant rest.
I experience severe fatigue levels that have overtaken my life; I am unable to complete more than half of my daily tasks.
answer_text: I experience mild fatigue. I do feel the need to rest more often, but I can still complete all my daily tasks

responses.qx_text: Which of the following best describes your ability to walk?
answer_options: I can walk without any problem
I have some difficulties with walking, but can walk without aid
I require a cane, crutch, or other aid to walk
I require a wheelchair for almost all activities
I am confined to bed most of the time
answer_text: I require a cane, crutch, or other aid to walk

About 600 to 899 feet, 200 meters or about 2 football fields
About 300 to 599 feet, 100 meters or about 1 football field

responses.qx_text: When I use an aid (cane, crutch, walker), I can walk:
